channel.title: How do i make a npc say automaticly if im online or ofline?
channel.description:
can anyone give me the code to make an npc say if im on or off? any help would be great
thanks in advance :cool:

item.title: How do i make a npc say automaticly if im online or ofline?
item.dc:creator: @kingchrist3 kingchrist3
item.description:
@kingchrist3 wrote:

This is quoted from Mr Hate from another post.

if (npcs.npcType == 5) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs.updateRequired = true; npcs.textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("mr hate")){ npcs.textUpdate = "mr hate is ofine ftl!"; } else{ npcs.textUpdate = mr hate is online ftw!"; } } } npc id is the id u want the npc to be and the mr hate is offline ftl is when hes offline and online is online isplayeron is the name u want the code to recognize say u want it to be your name change it to that ill let u figure out the rest Wink. hope i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say automaticly if im online or ofline?
